items.name: README.md
items.title: üìö Documentation & Getting Started
items.description: Complete documentation, installation guide, and educational resources. Start here to understand the project structure, safety practices, and how to use these scripts effectively.

items.name: brew_setup_tahoe.sh
items.title: üç∫ Homebrew Setup (Educational)
items.description: Educational Homebrew installer with interactive setup, dry-run mode, and comprehensive safety features. Perfect for learning shell scripting while automating macOS setup.

items.name: install-essential-apps.sh
items.title: üì¶ Essential Apps Installer
items.description: Batch installer for essential macOS applications using Homebrew. Installs productivity, development, and utility apps automatically.

items.name: setup-auto-update.sh
items.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Auto-Update Setup
items.description: Configures automatic Homebrew updates with text notifications. Sets up scheduled maintenance using macOS launchd.

items.name: setup-hybrid-notifications.sh
items.title: üìß Notification Setup (Email + SMS)
items.description: Advanced notification setup supporting both email and SMS alerts for system updates and maintenance tasks.

items.name: auto-update-brew.sh
items.title: üîÑ Auto-Update (Basic)
items.description: Basic automatic Homebrew updater with text notifications. Runs scheduled updates and sends status reports.

items.name: auto-update-brew-hybrid.sh
items.title: üîÑ Auto-Update (Advanced)
items.description: Advanced automatic updater with email and SMS notifications. Includes detailed reporting and error handling.

items.name: cleanup-homebrew.sh
items.title: üßπ Homebrew Cleanup
items.description: Comprehensive Homebrew maintenance script. Removes old packages, clears caches, and optimizes disk usage.
